Package org.freedesktop.wayland.raw

Class wl_argument

java.lang.Object
org.freedesktop.wayland.raw.wl_argument
public class wl_argument extends Object
union wl_argument {
    int32_t i;
    uint32_t u;
    wl_fixed_t f;
    const char *s;
    struct wl_object *o;
    uint32_t n;
    struct wl_array *a;
    int32_t h;
}

      public static MemorySegment asSlice(MemorySegment array, long index)
